object.name: MenuButtonWebApp
object.description: Represents a menu button, which launches a Web App.
object.html_description: Represents a menu button, which launches a Web App.
object.rst_description: Represents a menu button, which launches a `Web App <https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps>`_.

annotations.description: Type of the button, must be web_app
annotations.rst_description: Type of the button, must be *web_app*
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Description of the Web App that will be launched when the user presses the button. The Web App will be able to send an arbitrary message on behalf of the user using the method answerWebAppQuery.
annotations.html_description: Description of the Web App that will be launched when the user presses the button. The Web App will be able to send an arbitrary message on behalf of the user using the method answerWebAppQuery.
annotations.rst_description: Description of the Web App that will be launched when the user presses the button. The Web App will be able to send an arbitrary message on behalf of the user using the method :class:`aiogram.methods.answer_web_app_query.AnswerWebAppQuery`.
annotations.name: web_app
